content: how to deal with mental stress

To deal with mental stress, try Mind-Body Techniques such as Deep Breathing (4-7-8 technique), Meditation & Mindfulness (10 minutes a day), and Progressive Muscle Relaxation. Additionally, practice Mental & Emotional Strategies like Journaling, Positive Self-talk, and setting Realistic Goals. (Page 1)

Sources: How_to_Reduce_Stress_Levels.pdf (.pdf)
